name: 2 Pack 304 Stainless Steel Ball Valves, 1" NPT Female Shut Off Valve with Locking Handle Heavy Duty 1000 WOG for Home and Industrial (1 Inch)
short_description: 【Durable Stainless Steel Ball Valve】 - This 304 stainless steel heavy-duty construction ensures corrosion resistance and long-lasting performance in extreme temperatures and high-pressure environments.

【Secure Locking Device Design】 - This 304 Stainless Ball Valve with Integrated locking mechanism prevents accidental operation, offering enhanced safety and reliability for industrial, agricultural, or residential applications.
【NPT Female Threaded】 - Precision-engineered NPT female Ball Valve connections deliver airtight performance, compatible with standard plumbing and piping systems, ensure safety and leak free.

【Exquisite Craftsmanship】 - This 304 stainless steel Ball valves Exquisite craftsmanship, no burrs, can withstand working temperatures from -60 ° F to 450 ° F, and can withstand pressures up to 1000 PSI.
【Long Handle Ball Valve】 - Using a quarter turn long handle, suitable for ergonomics, Blue Vinyl Insulation on the handle, even wet hands will not slip.
【Versatile Ball Valve Solution】 - Ideal for shutoff, diverting, or regulating flow, this corrosion-resistant ball valve meets ANSI standards and suits HVAC, irrigation, or oil/gas systems.

name: U.S. Solid 1" Ball Valve – 316 Stainless Steel, Full Port, 1000 WOG, Heavy Duty, Corrosion-Resistant, Female NPT for Water, Oil, Gas, Industrial & Home Use
short_description: High-Quality Construction: Our ball valve is meticulously crafted using 316 stainless steel, a material known for its exceptional corrosion-resistance. This premium construction ensures the valve's durability and longevity, making it a reliable choice for both industrial and home applications.

Superior Sealing Performance: The valve is equipped with a PTFE seal material, a synthetic compound known for its excellent sealing capabilities. This ensures that the valve remains leak-proof, delivering consistent performance and reducing maintenance requirements.
High Pressure Capacity — Designed to handle working pressures of 16–25 bar, this valve delivers reliable performance across a wide range of applications and environments.

Female Connection Design: The ball valve is designed with a female x female connection. This is a commonly used format in both residential and industrial applications and allows for easy integration into existing setups.

Versatile Applications: Our ball valve is not just designed to perform under pressure but is also versatile enough to be used in a wide range of applications. Whether it's controlling water flow in residential plumbing or managing chemical processes in industrial setups, this ball valve is up to the task.

name: 3/4 Inch Ball Valve, Premium 304 Stainless Steel Full Port Forged NPT Ball Valve for Water Oil and Gas with Long Handle Shut Off Switch, 1000 WOG (2, FNPT x FNPT 3/4")
short_description: Quality Materials: Full Port Heavy Duty 3/4" Ball Valve is made of high quality 304 stainless steel, lead free, Safer and stronger, long lifetime. It is the ideal plug valve for high quality shut- off valves in industry or in the home and garden.

Suitable for a variety of media: The high-quality stainless steel ball valve is suitable for water, sea water, air, oil, and steam media with a temperature of -30 ℃～180℃.Since the ball valve has wiping properties during opening and closing, it can be used in media with suspended solid particles.

Convenient operation: This high pressure 3/4 inch ball valve has a comfortable operating handle, which opens and closes quickly. It only needs to rotate 90° from fully open to fully closed, which is convenient for quick control. When the handle is parallel to the pipe body, it is in an open state, and when it is vertical, it is in a closed state, so it is more convenient to observe whether the valve is open.

Good sealing: It has two sealing surfaces with good sealing performance and can achieve complete sealing. When fully open or fully closed, the sealing surface of the ball and the valve seat is isolated from the medium, and the medium will not cause erosion of the valve sealing surface when the medium passes.

Widely used: Ball valves are widely used in gardens, water pumps, corner rainwater tanks, external taps, rainwater connections with buckets, rainwater collectors, water pipes, etc. Also can be used for mechanical equipment, industrial equipment, water supply and drainage equipment.
